greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of Product_{k>0} theta_4(q^k)/theta_3(q^k), where theta_3() and theta_4() are the Jacobi theta functions.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Jacobi Theta Functions
mathematica: With[{nmax=80}, CoefficientList[Series[Product[EllipticTheta[4, 0, q^k]/EllipticTheta[3, 0, q^k], {k, 1, nmax+2}], {q, 0, nmax}], q]] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Oct 29 2018 *)
program: (PARI) m=80; q='q+O('q^m); Vec(1/prod(k=1,m+2, eta(q^(2*k))^6/( eta(q^k)^4* eta(q^(4*k))^2) )) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Oct 29 2018
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Oct 25 2018
